title: LF Plat(Last Season) Mid Laner for comp team
body:
Hi, we are looking for a Mid who wants to join a team that will be competing in tournaments regularly during the weekend.
we don't have a practice schedule sorted out yet but most tournaments are on weekends during the evenings (EST) and we are all available pretty regularly some are too available (me)
If you want to join we will do a tryout in a few games in flex or something add (Infernø) and we will setup a try out which will probably be tomorrow but not completely sure

replies.body: I might be interested. My ign name is Stellar Son. P5 currently, but peaked P2 last 2 seasons.
